channel.title: My edgeville yew cutter doesnt work!

item.title: My edgeville yew cutter doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

This procedure needs a mmouse in it, or it’ll just click if it see’s them in the wrong place!

procedure BankEm;
begin
wait(1000+random(100))
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then mmouse(x,y,3,3)
begin
Getmousepos(x,y)
Clickmouse(x,y,true)
Wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

item.title: My edgeville yew cutter doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

On your load bitmaps procedure, I don’t think there should be a ‘;’ after the Begin, all begins actually. For SRL and anti-randoms, go into your SRL folder, and look under scripts. WT-Fawki wrote an “Empty general purpose template” “For any kind of collecting script.”. It has walking to location, banking, and anti randoms, you just need to put in the wood cutting part. I don’t know how to use it or if it’s what your looking before, but it’s interesting to read. As why it doesn’t work, I have no idea. I haven’t tested it in RS but it compiles in SCAR.

[code]program MaryJanesYewCutter;
var
x, y, cut, bank : Integer;

const

tree1=3244659;
tree2=3758426;
tree3=3238234;
Bankbooth=9211540; //this is the glass part of the booth
Log1=542042;
Log2=541018;
//minimap colors
floorcolor=8684172;// lightgray part of bankfloor
treelogo=6177; //the brown part of the tree symbol

procedure CutNiggaCut;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
MoveMouse(x,y)
Wait(1000+Random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(cut,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
Wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure FindYew;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,treelogo,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
Wait(1000+Random(500))
begin
Getmousepos(x,y)
Clickmouse(x,y,true)
Wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure FindBank;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,floorcolor,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
Wait(1000+Random(500))
begin
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
Wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure BankEm;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
Wait(1000+Random(500))
begin
Getmousepos(x,y)
Clickmouse(x,y,true)
Wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure LoadBitmaps;
begin
cut:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DA3330A03E70357735’ +
‘7771452649D5656861E86C60E0E2EAE2E462062189D26500D205D’ +
‘10B01C86C5C7A813600CD87E825D58F03A2D709A8171C26F87D47’ +
‘5DBD1080192310332124A92620C7F56000008E0E9D74’);

bank:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DAC592410E0321084’ +
‘5AF044CA3CE56FDDCFF4855999936B69AA62E0612167E1FC12F44’ +
‘AB91917D7656FF506346428A094C3547AAB090F0EF2A14115A541’ +
‘DB0659E17CBA153B5752E2C879A5F591DCC3C63DD8C85C7067FB1’ +
‘E90EF6D30D0B53CDB177FFBB1F7CF0704FEC8EF5B9283D4F64972’ +
‘0FB7CD3ACFF519BB7C2F5A52D693D9E7DDBA5B0’);
end;

begin
LoadBitmaps;
repeat
Findyew;
Wait(4521+Random(547));
CutNiggaCut;
Wait(1278+Random(1648));
Findbank;
Wait(1234+Random(1357));
Bankem;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: My edgeville yew cutter doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @IheartMaryJane IheartMaryJane
item.description:
@IheartMaryJane wrote:

well i have a broken left arm at the moment so i just basically copied my old willow script =(, but i basically need help getting it to work and if you could help me figure out how to use SRL in it and antirandoms etc.
[scar]program MaryJanesYewCutter;
var x,y,cut,bank:integer;
const

tree1=3244659;
tree2=3758426;
tree3=3238234;
Bankbooth=9211540; //this is the glass part of the booth
Log1=542042;
Log2=541018;
//minimap colors
floorcolor=8684172;// lightgray part of bankfloor
treelogo=6177; //the brown part of the tree symbol
procedure cutniggacut;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemouse(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(cut,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure findyew;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,treelogo,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;
procedure findbank;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,floorcolor,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure bankem;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
Begin;
cut:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DA3330A03E70357735’ +
‘7771452649D5656861E86C60E0E2EAE2E462062189D26500D205D’ +
‘10B01C86C5C7A813600CD87E825D58F03A2D709A8171C26F87D47’ +
‘5DBD1080192310332124A92620C7F56000008E0E9D74’);

bank:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DAC592410E0321084’ +
‘5AF044CA3CE56FDDCFF4855999936B69AA62E0612167E1FC12F44’ +
‘AB91917D7656FF506346428A094C3547AAB090F0EF2A14115A541’ +
‘DB0659E17CBA153B5752E2C879A5F591DCC3C63DD8C85C7067FB1’ +
‘E90EF6D30D0B53CDB177FFBB1F7CF0704FEC8EF5B9283D4F64972’ +
‘0FB7CD3ACFF519BB7C2F5A52D693D9E7DDBA5B0’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
findyew;
wait(4521+random(547));
cutniggacut;
wait(1278+random(1648));
findbank;
wait(1234+random(1357));
bankem;
until(false)
end.[/scar]
